Sapphire High Performance SoC.description: Hardened High Performance Quad Core RISC-V SoC

PIP.description: MSIP (Machine-mode Software Interrupts) Register per Hart

mtimecmp(lo).description: Machine Time Compare Registers per Hart (Lower 32 bit)

mtimecmp(hi).description: Machine Time Compare Registers per Hart (Higher 32 bit)

uart0.description: The priority for UART 0 global interrupt

uart1.description: The priority for UART 1 global interrupt

uart2.description: The priority for UART 2 global interrupt

userTimer0.description: The priority for User Timer 0 global interrupt

userTimer1.description: The priority for User Timer 1 global interrupt

userTimer2.description: The priority for User Timer 2 global interrupt

spi0.description: The priority for SPI 0 global interrupt

spi1.description: The priority for SPI 1 global interrupt

spi2.description: The priority for SPI 2 global interrupt

i2c0.description: The priority for I2C 0 global interrupt

i2c1.description: The priority for I2C 1 global interrupt

i2c2.description: The priority for I2C 2 global interrupt

gpio0i0.description: The priority for GPIO 0 Interrupt 0 global interrupt

gpio0i1.description: The priority for GPIO 0 Interrupt 1 global interrupt

gpio1i0.description: The priority for GPIO 1 Interrupt 0 global interrupt

gpio1i1.description: The priority for GPIO 1 Interrupt 1 global interrupt

userIntA.description: The priority for User Interrupt A global interrupt

userIntB.description: The priority for User Interrupt B global interrupt

userIntC.description: The priority for User Interrupt C global interrupt

userIntD.description: The priority for User Interrupt D global interrupt

userIntE.description: The priority for User Interrupt E global interrupt

userIntF.description: The priority for User Interrupt F global interrupt

userIntG.description: The priority for User Interrupt G global interrupt

userIntH.description: The priority for User Interrupt H global interrupt

axiA.description: The priority for AXI A Interface global interrupt

txInterruptEnable.description: Enable interrupt when TX FIFO is empty

rxInterruptEnable.description: Enable interrupt when RX FIFO is not empty

txInterrupt.description: Interrupt when TX FIFO is empty

rxInterrupt.description: Interrupt when RX FIFO is not empty

divFac.description: Divider factor for UART baud rate

parity.description: Parity bit number; 0: None; 1: Even; 2: Odd

readError.description: Read error. Write 1 to reset error

readOverflow.description: Read overflow error. Write 1 to reset error

breakDetect.description: Break detected during read operation. Write 1 to reset error

ss.description: SPI chip select. Configure up to 8 chip select ID numbers

mode.description: SPI Mode selection. 0: Full duplex dual line. 1: Half-duplex dual line. 2: Half-duplex quad line

rspIntEn.description: Read FIFO not empty interrupt enable

rspInt.description: Read FIFO not empty interrupt pending

ssSetup.description: Time between the chip select enable and the next byte

ssHold.description: Time between the last byte transmission and the chip select disable

ssDisable.description: Time between the chip select disable and the chip select enable

ssActiveHigh.description: These bits correspond to the hardware SPI chip select. 0: Chip select is active low. 1: Chip select is active high.

data.description: Trigger to transmit data. The data width is configurable up to 16 bits.
Trigger to transmit data. The data width is configurable up to 16 bits.
Trigger to receive data. The data width is configurable up to 16 bits.

clockGenExitEnable.description: Master clock generation exit interrupt enable

clockGenEnterEnable.description: Master clock generation enter interrupt enable

filterEnable.description: Slave address filtering hit interrupt enable

clockGenExitFlag.description: Master clock generation exit interrupt flag

clockGenEnterFlag.description: Master clock generation enter interrupt flag

samplingClockDividerWidth.description: Clock divider width. Controls the rate at which the I2C controller reads SCL and SDA

startDropped.description: Indicates timeout occurred during start sequence. Clear on set

stopDropped.description: Indicates timeout occurred during stop sequence. Clear on set

recoverDropped.description: Indicates timeout occurred during recover sequence. Clear on set

inFrame.description: Indicates the transaction is already started.

sda.description: Read the current state of SDA line. 1: High state; 0: Low state

scl.description: Read the current state of SCL line. 1: High state; 0: Low state

sda.description: Force SDA line pull low when cleared

scl.description: Force SCL line pull low when cleared

value.description: Start and stop bus free time

10BitAddr.description: Set the filter address to 10 bits wide
Set the filter address to 10 bits wide

limitValue.description: Value for the timer to an generate output pulse

timerValue.description: Value of the increment counter when it detects a timer tick

limitValue.description: Value for the timer to an generate output pulse

timerValue.description: Value of the increment counter when it detects a timer tick
